name: Dan and the Dandy Dandelions
description:
Dandelion seeds are blowing in from Dan's neighbors' yards! Yoink and toss as many dandelions as you can back over the neighbor's fences to save your grass... and your sanity.

Features

  • Dandelion-pulling madness!
  • 1-player action!
  • Get off my lawn!
Credits Project Lead + ProgrammerJosh PowlisonDesignerAhmed HamedArtistColleene Kat
